title: Installation issue: py-horovod
body:
The py-horovod package doesn't seem to actually install anything.  Maybe @rvinaybharadwaj or @adamjstewart have an idea on how to fix it?

### Spack version
```console
$ spack --version
0.14.0-247-958f260
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install py-horovod
$ find ~/workspace/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-haswell/gcc-7.3.0/py-horovod-0.19.0-6bfj56gcf2pegrhj333s3glwks6zvtdx | grep -v \\.spack
~/workspace/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-haswell/gcc-7.3.0/py-horovod-0.19.0-6bfj56gcf2pegrhj333s3glwks6zvtdx
~/workspace/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-haswell/gcc-7.3.0/py-horovod-0.19.0-6bfj56gcf2pegrhj333s3glwks6zvtdx/lib
~/workspace/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-haswell/gcc-7.3.0/py-horovod-0.19.0-6bfj56gcf2pegrhj333s3glwks6zvtdx/lib/perl5
~/workspace/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-haswell/gcc-7.3.0/py-horovod-0.19.0-6bfj56gcf2pegrhj333s3glwks6zvtdx/lib/python3.7
~/workspace/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-haswell/gcc-7.3.0/py-horovod-0.19.0-6bfj56gcf2pegrhj333s3glwks6zvtdx/lib/python3.7/site-packages
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux --- 3.10.0-1062.9.1.1chaos.ch6.x86_64 #1 SMP Mon Dec 16 13:50:10 PST 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 7.7 (Maipo)
``` 

### Additional information

```console
$ spack spec --install-status py-horovod
```

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
